abstract: An old-time movie mogul will market “Creature” by connecting with fans on the backroads of the Internet.
snippet: An old-time movie mogul will market “Creature” by connecting with fans on the backroads of the Internet.
lead_paragraph: LOS ANGELES — It seems fair to ask why Sidney J. Sheinberg, 76 years old and long retired as president of MCA Inc., the erstwhile parent of Universal Pictures, spent much of last May tromping through the swamps of Louisiana with the crew of a little monster movie called “Creature.”

headline.main: It Came Out of the Viral Media Swamp
